nodes.text: Kavin bills were a form of currency used on Cato Neimoidia. By the time of the Galactic War, the Kavin bills were already considered rare and ancient, but were still in circulation. Gunaray Dod, the Neimoidian senator who represented Cato Neimoidia during the war, was known to use Kavin bills when making business with the Black Sun crime syndicate.
